api/index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp
api/index.html.keywords: JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp This is the documentation for JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp.

index.html.title: JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp
index.html.keywords: JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp JeremyAnsel.BcnSharp is a .Net library to encode and decode BCn BC3 BC5 BC7 texture compression formats. It is based on the bc7enc_rdo library. See https://github.com/richgel999/bc7enc_rdo
